content:
DataBoundLiteralControl Class

Definition

Retains data-binding expressions and static literal text. This class cannot be inherited.

In this Article

[System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItem(false)]
public sealed class DataBoundLiteralControl : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.ITextControl

Remarks

The DataBoundLiteralControl class persists the value of its Text property to view state.

Constructors

DataBoundLiteralControl(Int32,Int32)

Initializes a new instance of the DataBoundLiteralControl class.

public DataBoundLiteralControl (int staticLiteralsCount, int dataBoundLiteralCount);
staticLiteralsCount
Int32

Defines the size of the array to create for storing static literal strings.

dataBoundLiteralCount
Int32

Defines the size of the array to create for storing data-bound literal strings.

Properties

Text

Gets the text content of the DataBoundLiteralControl object.

public string Text { get; }
Value
String

A String that represents the text content of the DataBoundLiteralControl.

Remarks

The DataBoundLiteralControl class persists the value of its Text property to view state.

Assigns a string value to an array containing data-bound values.

Int32

The position in an array at which to retain the s parameter value.

s

A String containing the value for the data-bound expression.

SetStaticString(Int32,String)

Assigns a string value to an array containing static values.

public void SetStaticString (int index, string s);
index
Int32

The position in an array at which to retain the s parameter value.

s

Explicit Interface Implementations

ITextControl.Text

Gets or sets the text content of the DataBoundLiteralControl object.

string System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text { get; set; }
Returns
String

A String that represents the text content of the DataBoundLiteralControl.

Exceptions
NotSupportedException

An attempt to set the value is made.

Remarks

This implementation of the ITextControl interface returns the value of the Text property. The value of the Text property is persisted in the view state.

The DataBoundLiteralControl object implements ITextControl but does not support the set method on the Text property. All attempts to use this method will return a NotSupportedException exception.
